潶字的基本解释

潶
hēi
〔潶水〕同“黑水”，古河名，在古雍州境内。

潶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hēi］
［《廣韻》呼北切，入德，曉。］
水名。在古雍州境内。

潶字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　潶； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页651第01
【唐韻】呼北切，音黑。水名。【書·禹貢】潶水西河惟雍州。○按今書作黑水。

潶字的源字形

字源演变：

金文楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
潶字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Rush
hēi
[Changshui] Same as "Heishui", the name of the ancient river, in the territory of ancient Yongzhou.
Rush
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [hēi]
["Guangyun" Hubei cut, enter Germany, Xiao. ]
Water name. In the territory of Guyongzhou.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　潶; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 651 01
【Tang Yun】Hubei cut, tone black. Water name. [Book·Yugong] Rivershuixihe but Yongzhou. ○According to this book as Heishui.
